channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 10:52 Driven Alarm to Sumy Oblast.Creck on Further Messages.
item.description: 🟢 10:52 Driven Alarm to Sumy Oblast.Creck on Further Messages.#Sumy_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 🟡 10:22 Drawing of anxiety in Kharkiv region.
